featureSchema.name: Search and Filter
featureSchema.description: Enables users to find tasks quickly through keyword search and filtering by various parameters such as due date, category, or completion status.
featureSchema.userStory: As a user, I want to search for tasks using keywords and filter them based on specific criteria so that I can easily manage my to-do list.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria: The search feature should return relevant tasks instantly. Filter options must allow multi-criteria selection (e.g., by date, category, status).
featureSchema.additional: Incorporate auto-complete suggestions and use debounce methods to optimize performance.
featureSchema.prompt: Implement a search and filter functionality that enables keyword search and parameter-based filtering of tasks. It should update results in real-time as users type or select options.
featureSchema.notes: Ensure that the search is optimized for performance, especially for large sets of tasks.
